params.name: arrFill
params.description: the array of styles must contains 3 elements and consist of subtle, moderate and intense fills. If there are empty or no ApiFill elements in the array, it will be filled by Api.CreateNoFill() element.

params.name: arrBgFill
params.description: the array of background fill styles must contains 3 elements and consist of subtle, moderate and intense fills. If there are empty or no ApiFill elements in the array, it will be filled by Api.CreateNoFill() element.

params.name: arrLine
params.description: the array of line styles must contains 3 elements and consist of subtle, moderate and intense fills. If there are empty or no ApiStroke elements in the array, it will be filled by Api.CreateStroke(0, Api.CreateNoFill()) element.

ChangeEffectStyles.name: ChangeEffectStyles
ChangeEffectStyles.description: Need to do Sets the effect styles.

params.name: arrEffect
params.description: the array of line styles must contains 3 elements and consist of subtle, moderate and intense fills. If there are empty or no ApiStroke elements in the array, it will be filled by Api.CreateStroke(0, Api.CreateNoFill()) element.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of the specified theme's format scheme.
